author: James Van Straten
title: Strategy Expands Bitcoin Holdings by 705 BTC, Lifts Total BTC Stash to Over $61B
description: Company acquires additional BTC, leveraging preferred and common stock sales.
content:
Strategy (MSTR) has expanded its bitcoin 
 holdings with the purchase of an additional 705 BTC for approximately $75 million, bringing the companys total bitcoin holdings to 580,955 BTC. This latest… [+768 chars]
